title: The Legacy of the Fourth King
description: The fourth Wise Man missed the Nativity. Though his journey was tougher than the journey of the original three kings, he steadfastly sought out Bethlehem and Jesus' birth. Beset by misfortune, villains, and the relentless passing of time, he finally met up with the wise men, albeit years after the Nativity. He will not see the Son of Man until Good Friday. The Legacy of the Fourth King is a legacy of hope, dedication, faith, and forgiveness. While there is no historical basis for a real fourth wise man, this story supplements and enhances the pain of Christ's human death; and the power of the Resurrection. who came late and missed out on the Nativity, only to give his gifts on Good Friday.
author: Martin D. Gibbs
